name: Talking Baby Cat Max Pet Games
name_original: Talking Baby Cat Max Pet Games
description:
Meet Max Catomy the talking kitten. Max Catomy is a fun virtual pet that responds to your touch and repeats everything you say with his own hilarious voice. You can cuddle him, poke him pull his ears, play with his collar and much more. Like every little cat max is full of energy and loves to play all sorts of games but what he loves the most is soccer and basketball and he can barely wait to play them with you!

If you like talking animals games, virtual pet games, talking games or animal games in general then you will love Talking Baby Cat Max Pet Games!

Features:
- High quality 3D graphics
- Talking Animals: Talking Cat - Talking Baby Cat - Talking Pet - Talking Kitten - Talking Kitty
- Cat Games - Cat Game
- Talk to Max Catomy: Speak and he repeats what you say in his own funny voice.
- Play with Max: Basketball, Soccer, and an exciting cooking game.
- Customize / dress up: fur color change, sun glasses, new clothes, new outfits, caps and more.
- Take care of him: wash him, feed him, bring him to sleep etc.
- Many engaging mini games to be played
- Earn coins: Get coins by playing with Max and the different mini games.

Talking Baby Cat Max Pet Games is a free application. Download Talking Baby Cat Max Pet Games now and please rate it with 5 stars if you like it.
